title: Sony Patents a Robotic Gaming Companion That Has Feelings - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.17.20
description:
Blessing and Greg discuss a new Sony patent centered around having a robot friend. 

Time Stamps - 
 00:03:30 - Housekeeping
Joshpardy! Tonight! 6 pm Pt! kindafunny.com/joshmacuga
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:20 - Sony Has Patented a Robotic Gaming Companion - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:21:50 - Would you want a Buddy index?- Best Friends Q:Jamie S
00:25:00 - San Diego ComicCon Cancelled
00:28:32 - Nintendo Stock Price Hits 52-Week High Amid Switch Shortages - James O'Connor @ Gamespot
00:39:53 - Konami indefinitely delays PES Euro 2020 DLC and cancels boxed edition - James Batchelor @ GamesIndustry.biz
00:43:08 - PS Now is currently 25% off for new subscribers - James Pickard @Eurogamer
00:48:08 -  - Best Friends Q:RobbyRob
00:56:38 - Out today
Reader mail   -
01:01:10 - Which game do you think will be more valuable: P.T., or Cooking Mama: Cook Star? - KBABZ
01:04:50 - Squad Up:Jovan(Xbox One,PS4, & Switch) - XBox and PS4: Jovie84 Switch:SW-6060-9493-7527
01:06:00 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Blessing and Tim
TUESDAY: Blessing and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Gary
THURSDAY: Greg and Blessing
FRIDAY: Blessing and Greg 
01:06:10 - Post Show
